dc:title: Fall Appeal - December 1962
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Begs for help to pay rents and local taxes. Says their work is life-giving and "It is by prayer and alms that we do penance for our own sins and the sins of the world, and we can all give alms."
